Draft a reply to the specified GitHub issue or pull request comment thread. Before drafting:

  1. Read the full thread — all comments, not just the first post
  2. Identify: what is the person asking for, what has already been said, and what is still unresolved

The draft should:

  • Acknowledge the report or question specifically (not generically)
  • Ask for any information that is missing and needed to act on the request
  • Describe next steps if they are clear, or explain what needs to be determined first
  • Use a direct, respectful tone — no filler phrases like "Great question!" or "Thanks for your patience"
  • Be concise — under 150 words unless complexity requires more

End the draft with this note (do not include it in the draft itself): ⚠ Draft only. Read this carefully, edit as needed, and post it under your own name. The tone and content reflect on you, not the agent.
